TopicTitle: Rover Cruise Control- ASIDE from Mechjeb?

Articles.Content:
So I really need a cruise control mechanic- I can't seem to keep my rovers on target without one. Either I way undershoot my target speed and go nowhere, or I way OVERSHOOT and end up making craters.

The catch is Mechjeb's requires you to have the cockpit pointing in a -really- awkward angle, and disables the second you go IVA if your pod isn't facing that wonky angle.

Any tips?
The best is just attach a small jet engine or rocket with REALLY high ISP. But on the Mun or Minimus they can make you go orbital if not careful. Outside of mechjeb or holding down W yourself.
